name: Elevation web
tag_list: up-to-date-website, content-management-system, smart-fundraising, ecommerce, crm-by-salesforce, email-marketing, web-design, programming, joomla, wordpress, drupal, cms, open-source, non-profits, web-design-for-non-profits, software
overview:
Website: http://www.elevationweb.org

Company Overview: Elevation is a leading web solution firm for non-profit organizations. Since 2002 we have had the great privilege of assisting hundreds of non-profits, furthering their cause. Our excellent products and solutions are provided in a way that is accessible to most non-profit organizations.

We value our clients and strive to provide quality products and services with a high rate of return.

At Elevation we will always display a professional attitude, work efficiently, and communicate openly.

Mission: Elevation exists to help non-profit organizations spread their message effectively online.

Products: Up-to-Date Website - Content Management System - Smart Fundraising - Ecommerce - CRM by Salesforce - Email Marketing
